event: Fall of Western Roman Empire - beginning of medieval period
commit_message: Initial commit: Medieval period begins with Western Roman collapse

event: Foundation of Benedictine Monastery at Monte Cassino
commit_message: Feature: Monastic tradition foundational to medieval culture

event: Charlemagne crowned Emperor by the Pope
commit_message: Major release: Holy Roman Empire established, Carolingian Renaissance
Feature: Major political and social transformation in England

event: Reign of Pope Gregory VII - Investiture Controversy
commit_message: Security update: Church-state conflict reshapes European power structure

event: University of Bologna founded - first modern university
commit_message: Innovation: First university establishes model for higher education

event: First Crusade proclaimed by Pope Urban II
commit_message: Feature: Crusading movement begins, connecting Europe with Middle East
Build: Gothic cathedral construction revolutionizes architecture

event: High medieval prosperity and population growth
commit_message: Release: Peak of medieval civilization and culture

event: Black Death pandemic devastates European population
commit_message: Critical: Bubonic plague causes massive demographic and social crisis

event: Hundred Years' War between England and France
commit_message: Major update: Long war transforms military and political systems

event: Fall of Constantinople to Ottoman Turks
commit_message: Security breach: End of Byzantine Empire, affects medieval balance

event: Columbus reaches Americas - beginning of early modern period
commit_message: End of life: Medieval period ends with Age of Discovery
